title: Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story Soundtrack
description:
First Torrent, plz forgive if I f#^k it up...

=========================================

Soundtrack to Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story

Multiple Tracks have been used in many Movie Trailers.  Out of print, have seen this on sale for upwards of $60.00 online.

mp3 format: 160kbps

    * Original Release Date: April 27, 1993
    * Number of Discs: 1
    * Format: Soundtrack
    * Label: Mca
